view.dialogs

Class TreeSaver

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.dialogs.TreeSaver

  • public class TreeSaver
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for saving functionality. The tree is serialized into a JSON array in a text file (name and location are chosen by user)
    Author:
    Wouter
